page.title: 15Local News (2)
page.content: This page continues a look at a week in Wellington. {Father and Sons Camp }Twenty six members of the Wellington Boys Club and 19 of their fathers spent an enjoyable weekend at Axmouth. {Curate Ordained as a Priest } Wellington clergyman,Rev.G.Walsh,of Ashford drive,has been ordained. {Ray is New United Manager.}Former Worcester City footballer Ray Rowling is to be the new manager of Wellington United who play in Division 2 of the Taunton Sunday League. {Greaves and Hayes in Stand of 122.} Rain stopped Wellingtons 1st X1's home match against Burnham on Saturday in Division 1 of the Somerset Cricket League but they still managed to pick up nine points.
